summary: Created 2-service architecture solution for Railway deployment. Separated backend (Node.js API) and frontend (Static React app) into different services. Created backend/package.json, backend/server.js, frontend/package.json, frontend/index.html, and comprehensive documentation in RAILWAY_TWO_SERVICES.md. This approach resolves all deployment conflicts and provides better scalability.
current_status: Ready for 2-service Railway deployment. Backend service will handle API and database, frontend service will serve static React app. Both services can be deployed independently with proper environment variables and CORS configuration. This architecture provides better performance, scalability, and easier debugging.
